__e: What Khan and his men did, was that right or wrong?
And yet, my son will be Khan, and his son after him.
You are as a son to the Khan and to me.
Khan, there's no reason I must watch this, is there?
Mr. Khan. We don't know each other.. ..so leave it to me about what I should or shouldn't do.
Stupid Khan couldn't do a simple job.
The count must be holding them.
No, no, no, no, what Mr. Khan is saying is possible.
Khan's smart, but he's never been in the system.
The truth, Great Khan, is that I did not know if I would finish the journey alive.
The honor that has been bestowed upon me by the Great Khan is far greater and nobler than an old man like myself deserves.
You wear the Khan's gold seal. It gives you your authority to take what you will.
I can't thank you enough. I'd be lost without this little guy.
He also represents Khan, which could explain how a blue blood like Khan got plugged in to the gang world.
